column4: Hello! I'm using Ubuntu 7.10, and I have downloaded the latest version of Beta Ubuntu 8.04 desktop version, can I update my Ubuntu?
have u downloaded the iso?
Yes, I have
arghh, im not *EXACTLY* sure how to upgrade from cd
What's the otherwise?
u can let the update mnager handle it - it will download all the required packages & install em
it usually works better then doing a command line upgrade from cd
That's too big for my concoction..
ahh, so u downloaded the iso at work or something?
by using torrnet
did u get the alternate or the desktop cd?
Desktop, I'm downloading the other one now..
yeh u need the alternate: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/HardyUpgrades#head-7311a7de9fdf1ca310c6937460c0a9d33f54279d
it seems pretty straight forward after that :)
Can I select some package only?
hmm i dont think so
ohh yeh what
he was right, this first time, when I try help someone there :)
What's the diff between updating using a CD and the commend line?
hmmm, well it will use the internet do download the packages if u use command line
I see that, I meant: You prefer commend like, why?
* commend line
well i dont really prefer
cd is actually good if u want to upgrade many computers
